name: Project Solstice
description:
This is a small time trial track to fly Destiny ships on, somewhere near Saturn.

But really this is a half decent excuse to pick up unity and C# for the first time.

This requires a controller, and was tested on Windows with X360, Xbone, and PS4 controllers.

Destiny and its ships are © 2016 Bungie, Inc. All rights reserved.

Please don't sue me...

This is just fanfic.

I just wanted to fly my ship.

Gameplay by Marc Hughley

Music by @opredeim

Saturn by Brittany Jackson

C# guidance by Collum Cantwell

Thanks to my Lab Rats:

Nikki, Cobb, Holly, Josh, Kellen, Kirby, Maercyi, Pony, and Ray.

You are my heroes.
